div.class:
MC2 Mission: Empowering me with the knowledge, skills, and dispositions to use my unique voice effectively and with integrity in co-creating our global public world.
Students graduate from MC2 as stewards of their world. They have the will, skill, capacity, and knowledge to contribute to the greater good, and are ready for college, career, and life.

p.span: MC2 schools work effectively with families, community members, and social service agencies to solve real problems and enable each individual student to become empowered with the knowledge, skills, and dispositions to use his or her voice effectively and with integrity in co-creating our world.

div.p: Making Community Connections Charter School is a tuition-free, public charter school, enrolling students from any community in New Hampshire.

br.br:
Sarah Foucher was an original pioneer of the Making Community Connections Charter
School Monadnock Campus …
Read More →

Tori Fiorey has been an ambassador for charter schools since Kindergarten, starting with her enrollment in the Surry …
Read More →

Ben Bigaj joined the Monadnock Campus of MC2 in August of 2015 and began using his voice almost immediately …
Read More →
Though no one can be accurately described in just three virtues, there are three that come to mind when Jackie’s name is mentioned…
